price: "Kuma bã ni tambayar ku wata ijãra a kansa. Ijãrãta ba ta zama ba fãce da a Ubangijin halittu."
arabic: وَمَآ أَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ أَجۡرٍۖ إِنۡ أَجۡرِيَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā asalukum ʿalayhi min ajrin in ajriya illā ʿalā rabbi al-ʿālamīna
